item.title: About this Blog
item.description: Why does this blog exists? Teaching is the best way to learn. ~unknown The above quote, is in essense why this blog exists. Throught this blog I intend to: Primarily share resources on various aspects as I go through my software engineering journey. Through this sharing, solidy what I’ve learnt. I don’t intent to limit the scope to just Django, I’ll be including all types of resources.
